    • findAll

      public List<Admin> findAll()
      Gets all the administrators from the database
      Returns:
      a list of all the administrators

    • findById

      public Optional<Admin> findById(Integer id)
      Gets the administrator with the specified id
      Parameters:
      id - the id I want the administrator that I am looking for to have
      Returns:
      either an admin object, or null in case the admin with the specified id does not exist in the database

    • findByUsername

      public Optional<Admin> findByUsername(String name)
      Gets the administrator with the specified name
      Parameters:
      name - the name I want the administrator that I am looking for to have
      Returns:
      either an admin object, or null in case the admin with the specified name does not exist in the database

    • checkIfValid

      public String checkIfValid(String email, String username)
      Checks if the email and the username do not exist yet in the database and if the email is valid
      Parameters:
      email - the email that I want to check if is valid and unused yet
      username - the username that I want to check if is unused yet
      Returns:
      a string representing a message showing the state of this verification

    • login

      public String login(String username, String password)
      Checks the introduced credentials and if they are correct, the admin will be allowed to enter his account
      Parameters:
      username - the username entered by the user
      password - the password entered by the user
      Returns:
      a string which shows if the credentials are correct or not, case which happen when either the username does not exist or the password introduced does not match the password associated to the entered username
